instructions: Peel the banana and core the apple.
Blend the banana, apple, yogurt, milk, and honey until smooth.
Serve chilled.
Cook the oats with water or milk in a pot.
Slice the banana and apple and stir them into the oatmeal.
Sprinkle with cinnamon and serve.
Mash the banana.
Mix pancake batter with the mashed banana and vanilla extract.
Cook pancakes in a pan.
Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mash the bananas and mix them with the chopped apples.
Combine flour, baking soda, sugar, and butter in a bowl.
Bake the bread for 50-60 minutes.
Slice the banana and apple.
Toss them with the mixed greens, lemon juice, and olive oil.
Serve immediately.
Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mash the banana and mix with honey.
Mix dry ingredients and combine with the wet ingredients.
Spoon batter into muffin tins and bake for 20-25 minutes.
Peel and chop the apples.
Blend the fruit with cream, sugar, and vanilla until smooth.
Freeze for 2 hours or until firm.
Chop the banana and apple.
Cook with vinegar, sugar, and cinnamon until the mixture thickens.
Serve as a condiment with meats or cheese.
Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Slice the bananas and place them in a baking dish.
Mix oats, butter, and sugar, then sprinkle over the fruit.
Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown.
Blend the apple and yogurt until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with chia seeds and granola.
